description: Since we started in 2007, Vagabondpinas has served more than 1500 clients both locally and internationally, and has completed more than 6,000 trips across Philippines, Asia and South Africa! We also offer Transportation Services, Professional Guided Tours most especially in Banaue Rice Terraces, Batad and Sagada, and customized tours! Together, let us discover the world, one adventure at a time.

description:
We’re a reputable licensed tour operator in Banaue, Philippines. We are specialised in Banaue, Hapao and Sagada tours.
With our passion in travel industry, we’re committed to offer competitive value for money products and high level services in order to achieve total client satisfaction.
We provide a concise description about the people, their Culture and History. 
Your Satisfaction Is Our Pride

name: Trek Banaue /Batad - Eddie Cabigat
location_string: Banaue, Ifugao Province, Cordillera Region, Luzon
description:
Discover the rice terraces for a trek of one or more days.
Banaue is the starting point to admire the beauty of Ifugao rice paddies. A unique experience, exceptional points of view and wonderful memories.
